name: Air Strike WW2
description:
Air Strike: WWII is a realistic 3D fight simulator where you fly a WWII fighter plane and shoot down enemy aircraft.
You have both guns and missiles to help you destroy the incoming fighters. You can use the power boost button to increase your speed.
The on screen radar helps you during combat to locate and engage other planes.
There are two camera views to choose: The follow camera allows you to see your fighter plane from behind and gives you a wider angle of view. The cockpit camera puts you in the cockpit of the plane.
